comments: She is the most amazing teacher and person you will ever meet. She helped me discover my voice in a healthy and efficient way. She listens to your concerns and helps you become the best musician you can be. She offers the right amount of encouragement and tough love. When she goes home she thinks about your voice and does research so she can help
She is simply the best voice teacher I have ever had. She combines a great knowledge of vocal technique with amazing musicality. Plus, she is incredibly supportive and understanding!
She is an amazing vocal teacher who really has a vision for vocal development. She knows how the body works to produce sound and gives students lots of options. You will learn so much from her.
